info.id: HR81490 - Error printing from COM SA, with string that contains '@' character
info.description: HR81490 - Error printing from COM SA, with string that contains '@' character

config.cli_expected_output_1: ['ERROR: Call command failed, error code: ComFailure', 'Messages from transaction participants:', 'forced ERROR: @This is for test purpose']
